com.threeNews.springproject.api

接口 NewsRepository

  • 所有超级接口:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<News,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<News,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<News,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<News>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<News,java.lang.Long>

    public interface NewsRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<News,java.lang.Long>
    The repository class in springboot to execute sql
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Jinhao Zhong

    • 方法详细资料

      • findByName

        @Query(value="select * from news where news_title=?1",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.List<News> findByName(java.lang.String name)

      • search

        @Query(value="select * from news where news_title like \'%?%\'",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.List<News> search(java.lang.String name)

      • randomNews

        @Query(value="select * from news order by rand() LIMIT 1",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.List<News> randomNews()

      • findById

        @Query(value="select * from news where news_id=?1",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.List<News> findById(long id)

      • findLikedById

        @Query(value="select * from news n join user_liked ul on n.news_id=ul.news_id where ul.user_id=?1",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.List<News> findLikedById(long id)

      • isLikedById

        @Query(value="select isLiked from user_liked where user_id=?1 and news_id=?2",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.List<java.lang.Long> isLikedById(long id,
                                                                                                                                                     long news_id)

      • isBookMarkById

        @Query(value="select isBookmark from user_bookmark where user_id=?1 and news_id=?2",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.List<java.lang.Long> isBookMarkById(long id,
                                                                                                                                                              long news_id)

      • addLiked

        @Modifying
 @Query(value="insert into user_liked (user_id,news_id,isLiked) values (?,?,?)",
       nativeQuery=true)
void addLiked(long userId,
                                                                                                                                      long newsId,
                                                                                                                                      long code)

 @Query(value="delete from user_liked where user_id=?1 and news_id=?2",
       nativeQuery=true)
void removeliked(long userId,
                                                                                                                                long newsId)

      • addBookMark

        @Modifying
 @Query(value="insert into user_bookmark (user_id,news_id,isBookmark) values (?1,?2,1)",
       nativeQuery=true)
void addBookMark(long userId,
                                                                                                                                                 long newsId)

      • updateLiked

        @Query(value="update user_liked set isLiked=?1 where user_id=?2 and news_id=?3",
       nativeQuery=true)
 @Modifying
void updateLiked(long code,
                                                                                                                                          long id,
                                                                                                                                          long news_id)
